1. Microsoft begins blocking some terms that caused its AI tool to create violent, sexual images  CNBC
  2. Copilot can't stop emitting violent, sexual images, says Microsoft whistleblower  The Register
  3. Microsoft's Copilot now blocks some prompts that generated violent and sexual images  Engadget
  4. Microsoft AI engineer warns FTC about Copilot Designer safety concerns  The Verge
  5. Censored Microsoft Copilot can still make vulgar images  Windows Central

item.title: Dozens of Top Scientists Sign Effort to Prevent A.I. Bioweapons - The New York Times
item.description:
1. Dozens of Top Scientists Sign Effort to Prevent A.I. Bioweapons  The New York Times
  2. Could AI-designed proteins be weaponized? Scientists lay out safety guidelines  Nature.com
  3. The Readout: Amylyx, Alumis, and Lundbeck drug updates  STAT
  4. Researchers Develop New Way to Purge AI of Unsafe Knowledge  TIME
  5. Scientists rally around the safe use of AI-designed proteins  Interesting Engineering
